item.title: 台积电展望人工智能需求强劲，芯片股上涨
item.description: 在本周整个半导体行业数十亿美元的交易中，顶级合约芯片制造商台积电发布了一份乐观的预测，激发了人们对人工智能基础设施需求的乐观情绪，半导体类股周四走高。【原文：Semiconductor stocks advanced on Thursday after top contract chipmaker TSMC issued a rosy forecast, fanning optimism about demand for artificial intelligence infrastructure in a week of multi-billion-dollar deals across the sector.】

item.title: 道明银行聘请业内资深人士担任总法律顾问和财务主管，以加强美国团队的实力
item.description: 多伦多道明银行（Toronto Dominion Bank）周四任命业内资深人士布莱恩-卡莱纳（Brian Callanan）为美国总法律顾问，安德烈-拉莫斯（Andre Ramos）为美国财务主管。【原文：Toronto Dominion Bank on Thursday named industry veterans Brian Callanan as U.S. general counsel and Andre Ramos as U.S. finance head in the Canadian lender's latest push for a stronger footprint south of the border.】

item.title: 英国间谍头目警告人工智能的危险，但并非灾难片中的厄运
item.description: 英国军情五处（MI5）间谍机构负责人周四表示，不受人类控制的人工智能系统有朝一日可能会对安全构成威胁，但他并不是在预测科幻电影中描述的末日场景。【原文：AI systems acting without human control could one day pose a security threat, the head of Britain's MI5 spy agency said on Thursday, although he said he was not predicting doom scenarios as depicted in sci-fi movies.】

item.title: 美国经纪商施瓦布凭借客户资产和交易实力实现创纪录利润
item.description: 美国经纪公司嘉信理财（Charles Schwab）周四公布的第三季度利润超出预期，原因是客户资产创下新纪录，交易收入飙升。【原文：U.S. brokerage firm Charles Schwab beat third-quarter profit expectations on Thursday as client assets hit a new record and trading revenue soared.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）上调亚洲经济增长预期并警告风险
item.description: 国际货币基金组织周四上调了亚洲经济增长预期，但警告称贸易政策不确定性和地缘政治紧张局势将给亚洲经济前景带来风险。【原文：The International Monetary Fund revised up Asia's economic growth forecast on Thursday, but warned of risks to the outlook from trade policy uncertainty and geopolitical tensions.】

item.title: 美国大西洋沿岸中部地区 10 月份制造业收缩；价格措施增加
item.description: 10 月份，美国大西洋中部地区的工厂活动出人意料地萎缩，更多的制造商报告称，他们支付和收到的投入品和货物价格上涨，这表明通胀仍有可能进一步上升。【原文：Factory activity in the U.S. mid-Atlantic region unexpectedly contracted in October, and more manufacturers reported paying and receiving higher prices for inputs and their goods, suggesting inflation could still rise further.】

item.title: 汇丰银行上调 2025 年和 2026 年黄金均价预测
item.description: 由于地缘政治紧张局势、经济不确定性和美元走软所带来的避险需求，汇丰银行将 2025 年黄金平均价格预测从每盎司 3215 美元上调至 3355 美元。【原文：HSBC has raised its 2025 average gold price forecast to $3,355 per ounce from $3,215 due to safe-haven demand driven by geopolitical tensions, economic uncertainty, and a weakening U.S. dollar.】

item.title: 美联储主席沃勒尔赞成在就业市场担忧的情况下于 10 月降息 25 个基点
item.description: 美联储理事克里斯托弗-沃勒（Christopher Waller）周四表示，由于就业市场状况喜忧参半，他同意在本月晚些时候举行的美国央行政策会议上再次降息。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Christopher Waller said on Thursday he's on board with another interest rate cut at the U.S. central bank's policy meeting later this month because of the mixed readings on the state of the job market.】

item.title: 微软为 Windows 11 推出新的人工智能升级，增强 Copilot 功能
item.description: 微软周四为 Windows 11 推出了一系列人工智能升级，使其 Copilot 人工智能助手更容易自动执行任务和跨设备连接服务，从而对用户更具吸引力。【原文：Microsoft on Thursday rolled out a series of artificial intelligence upgrades to Windows 11 that would make its Copilot AI assistant more appealing to users by making it easier to automate tasks and connect with services across devices.】

item.title: Lyft 将在多伦多开设技术中心，进一步拓展美国市场
item.description: 打车公司 Lyft 周四表示，计划明年下半年在多伦多市中心开设一个新的技术中心，使多伦多成为仅次于旧金山的第二大技术中心。【原文：Lyft plans to open a new technology hub in downtown Toronto in the second half of next year, making the city its second-largest tech center after San Francisco, the ride-hailing firm said on Thursday.】

item.title: IAM 对波音公司提出不公平劳动行为指控
item.description: 国际机械师和航空航天工人协会周四表示，它已向美国全国劳工关系委员会（National Labor Relations Board）提出对波音公司不公平劳动行为的指控。【原文：The International Association of Machinists and Aerospace Workers said on Thursday it has filed an unfair labor practice charge against Boeing with the National Labor Relations Board.】

item.title: 老挝计划在 2026 年初之前关闭加密货币矿机
item.description: 老挝能源部副部长告诉路透社，老挝正在考虑到 2026 年第一季度停止向加密货币矿工供电，因为老挝希望将国内电力转向对经济增长贡献更大的行业。【原文：Laos is considering halting electricity supply to cryptocurrency miners by the first quarter of 2026, as it seeks to redirect domestic power to industries that contribute more to economic growth, the country's deputy energy minister told Reuters.】

item.title: 美联储主席巴金消费者正在消费，但不像大流行病时期那么旺盛
item.description: 里士满联储主席托马斯-巴尔金（Thomas Barkin）周四表示，在低失业率和工资增长的情况下，消费者仍在继续消费，但与大流行病时期相比，他们的消费受到了更多限制。【原文：Consumers continue to spend given low unemployment and wage gains, but are more constrained than during the pandemic years, Richmond Fed president Thomas Barkin said on Thursday.】

item.title: 巴西 8 月经济活动增幅低于预期
item.description: 巴西央行周四公布的数据显示，8月份巴西经济活动增幅低于预期，越来越多的经济学家预计，在紧缩货币政策的影响下，巴西经济将出现更大幅度的放缓。【原文：Brazil's economic activity increased less than expected in August, central bank data showed on Thursday, as a growing chorus of economists anticipate a sharper slowdown ahead amid tight monetary policy.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织总裁格奥尔基耶娃敦促各国继续将贸易作为增长引擎
item.description: 国际货币基金组织总裁克里斯塔琳娜-格奥尔基耶娃（Kristalina Georgieva）周四敦促各成员国在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收新关税的情况下，继续将贸易作为世界经济增长的引擎。【原文：International Monetary Fund Managing Director Kristalina Georgieva on Thursday urged member countries to keep trade as an engine of growth for the world economy despite President Donald Trump's steep new tariffs.】

item.title: 美联储的沃勒：现有数据显示劳动力持续疲软，为降息提供支持
item.description: 美联储理事克里斯托弗-沃勒（Christopher Waller）周四表示，即使在美国政府就业报告未及时公布的情况下，现有数据也始终显示出招聘疲软的情况，这增强了美联储降息的必要性，即使其他数据显示经济增长稳健。【原文：Data available even in the absence of delayed U.S. government employment reports tells a consistent story of weak hiring, bolstering the need for the Federal Reserve to cut rates even as other data points to solid economic growth, Fed Governor Christopher Waller said on Thursday.】

item.title: StanChart 称，外汇储备管理者对美元走势作出反应，而非推动美元走势
item.description: 渣打银行（Standard Chartered）在周四的一份报告中称，储备经理们倾向于在美元走弱时买入美元，而在美元上涨时卖出美元，这表明他们在推动美元走强方面所起的作用可能不如私人投资者。【原文：Reserve managers tend to buy the dollar when it weakens and sell when it rises, suggesting they might play a lesser role in driving the greenback than private investors, Standard Chartered said in a note on Thursday.】

item.title: 美联储主席米兰：明年经济增长取决于中美紧张局势如何解决 - Fox Business
item.description: 美国联邦储备委员会理事斯蒂芬-米兰（Stephen Miran）表示，未来一年的经济增长可能取决于围绕中美贸易不断升级的风险是实现了还是化解了。【原文：U.S. Federal Reserve Governor Stephen Miran said economic growth for the coming year could turn on whether the escalating risks around U.S.-China trade are realized or defused.】

item.title: 土耳其电信、土耳其电信和沃达丰在土耳其 29.5 亿美元的 5G 招标中赢得频率
item.description: 土耳其 5G 频谱招标周四吸引了总计 29.5 亿美元的中标，土耳其主要运营商 Turkcell、沃达丰和土耳其电信获得了 700 MHz 和 3.5 GHz 频率范围内的关键频段。【原文：Turkey's 5G spectrum tender drew a total of $2.95 billion in winning bids on Thursday, with the country's major operators Turkcell, Vodafone and Turk Telekom securing key blocks across the 700 MHz and 3.5 GHz frequency ranges.】

item.title: 工具制造商斯纳普-昂（Snap-On）季度业绩超出预期，因维修需求增加
item.description: 本周四，由于汽车零部件公司和维修店的需求复苏促进了公司工具制造产品的销售，斯耐普公司第三季度的收入和利润均超出预期。【原文：Snap-On beat third-quarter revenue and profit estimates on Thursday as recovering demand from auto parts companies and repair shops boosted sales for the company's tool-making products.】

item.title: 早间竞标：人工智能风起云涌，银行业欣欣向荣
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 中国零售商将 "光棍节 "延长至五周以刺激消费
item.description: 今年，中国零售商将一年一度的 "光棍节 "促销活动延长至长达五周的时间，阿里巴巴和京东等公司试图在经济挣扎的情况下吸引购物者的兴趣。【原文：Chinese retailers are stretching their annual "Singles' Day" sales bonanza to as long as five weeks this year, as the likes of Alibaba and JD.com try to drum up interest from shoppers in a struggling economy.】

item.title: 美国贷款公司 KeyCorp 利润因利息收入增加而增长
item.description: KeyCorp 周四公布，由于存款成本降低和转向高收益资产，净利息收入激增，第三季度利润大幅增长。【原文：KeyCorp reported a jump in third-quarter profit on Thursday as net interest income surged on lower deposit costs and a shift toward higher-yielding assets.】

item.title: Fintech Upgrade 融资 1.65 亿美元，目标在 12 至 18 个月内上市
item.description: 消费金融金融科技公司 Upgrade 周四表示，它在最新一轮融资中筹集了 1.65 亿美元，这距离它上一次在 2021 年金融科技热潮中对外融资已过去近四年时间。【原文：Consumer finance fintech Upgrade said on Thursday it raised $165 million in its latest funding round, nearly four years after its last external financing during the height of the 2021 fintech boom.】

item.title: 宜家积极降价，销售额连续第二年下降
item.description: 宜家周四公布的年销售额连续第二年下降，原因是这家经济型家具零售商坚持采取降价策略，以吸引资金紧张的消费者，并在竞争激烈的市场中抢占市场份额。【原文：IKEA's annual sales fell for a second consecutive year, it reported on Thursday, as the budget furniture retailer stuck to a strategy of cutting prices to attract cash-strapped consumers and gain market share in a fiercely competitive market.】

item.title: Salesforce 跳涨，600 亿美元的预期缓解了对收入增长的担忧
item.description: Salesforce 周四在盘前交易中股价大涨逾 6%，此前该公司预测未来几年营收将加速增长，从而缓解了人们对人工智能工具侵蚀其软件需求的担忧。【原文：Salesforce shares jumped more than 6% in premarket trading on Thursday, after the company forecast faster revenue growth in the coming years, easing concerns that AI tools were eroding demand for its software.】

item.title: 旅行者保险公司利润因巨灾损失减少、承保能力增强而大幅增长
item.description: 保险业的风向标旅行者公司（Travelers Companies）周四公布第三季度利润大增，主要得益于灾难损失减少、承保费用增加以及投资回报率提高。【原文：Insurance bellwether Travelers Companies reported a profit surge in the third quarter on Thursday, helped by lower catastrophe losses, stronger underwriting fees and higher investment returns.】

item.title: 印度 Infosys 收窄年度收入增长预期
item.description: 印度第二大 IT 服务出口商 Infosys 周四上调了全年收入增长预期的下限，此前该公司第二季度收入因金融服务和制造业的强劲表现而超出预期。【原文：India's second-largest IT services exporter Infosys on Thursday raised the lower end of its annual revenue growth forecast after second-quarter revenue beat estimates on strong performance in financial services and manufacturing.】

item.title: 因债务交换要约截止日期延长，Fossil 股价暴跌 40
item.description: 美国手表制造商 Fossil 周四在盘前交易中股价暴跌 40%，此前该公司一直在进行债务重组，并宣布计划延长兑换 2026 年到期优先票据的最后期限。【原文：Shares of U.S. watchmaker Fossil tumbled 40% in premarket trading on Thursday, after the company, which has been restructuring its debt, announced plans to extend the deadline to exchange its senior notes due 2026.】

item.title: 薪资平台 Deel 在最新一轮融资中估值达 173 亿美元
item.description: 薪酬初创公司 Deel 周四表示，该公司在新一轮融资中筹集了 3 亿美元，由新投资者 Ribbit Capital 与现有支持者 Andreessen Horowitz 和 Coatue Management 共同领投，公司估值达 173 亿美元。【原文：Payroll startup Deel said on Thursday it raised $300 million in a funding round, led by new investor Ribbit Capital alongside existing backers Andreessen Horowitz and Coatue Management, valuing the company at $17.3 billion.】
